titleStmt.title: The preface, being a summary account of the divers dispensations of God to men from the beginning of the world to that of our present age, by the ministry and testimony of his faithful servant George Fox, as an introduction to the ensuing journal.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, at the Crooked Billet in Holly-well-lane, Shoreditch, and near the meeting-house in White-hart-court in Grace-church-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.

place.placeName: the meeting-house in White-hart-court in Grace-church-street
